# App name tour.app.name=관광
# Class fields TourCode.TourClass_description=설명 TourCode.TourClass_isActive=활동적인 TourCode.TourClass_targetPage=대상 페이지
# Live table generic keys tour.livetable.doc.title=투어명 tour.livetable._actions=행위 tour.livetable._actions.edit=편집하다 tour.livetable._actions.delete=삭제 tour.livetable._actions.launch=시작하다 tour.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys tour.livetable.description=설명 tour.livetable.isActive=활동적인 tour.livetable.targetPage=대상 페이지 tour.livetable.targetClass=대상 클래스
# Tour popover tour.popover.previous=« 이전 tour.popover.next=다음 " tour.popover.end=투어 종료 ### Missing: tour.popover.quit=Quit tour ### Missing: tour.popover.show=Show tour ### Missing: tour.popover.show.hint=You can restart the tour by clicking this button at anytime
# Steps ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_order=Order ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_element=Element (CSS selector that identify an element) ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_title=Title ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_content=Content ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_backdrop=Backdrop ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_placement=Placement ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_targetPage=Target Page ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_action=Target Action ### Missing: TourCode.StepClass_queryString=Query String ### Missing: tour.steps=Steps ### Missing: tour.steps.new_step=New step ### Missing: tour.steps.add_step=Add step ### Missing: tour.steps.edit_step=Edit step ### Missing: tour.steps.save_step=Save ### Missing: tour.steps.delete_confirm=Are you sure you want to delete the step? ### Missing: tour.steps.delete_done=Delete step done! ### Missing: tour.steps.deleting=Deleting step... ### Missing: tour.steps.yes=Yes ### Missing: tour.steps.no=No ### Missing: tour.steps.edit=Edit ### Missing: tour.steps.delete=Delete
